attributes.action: Get rid of the bus lane on the North Circular, A406 in Edmonton/ Palmers Green
attributes.additional_details: There is a huge amount of congestion and traffic that happens on that particular road, which is resulted as of the bus lane. There are hardly any buses that drive on this road for it to be a full time bus and taxi lane. If this bus lane was to go, and it be replaced with another lane for drivers, it would reduce the amount of congestion, making it a safer, less polluted place for London.
attributes.background: I would like the 24/7 bus/ taxi lane in the area of Palmers Green/ Edmonton on the north circular road, prior to pymmes road, another lane.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about this bus lane are a matter for Transport for London, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
